Projects

IST Panel 2017

My Vision

My goal is to become an excellent Instructional Technology Consultant in higher education, designing and developing online/hybrid courses and helping instructors reach their potential in teaching.

I have extensive knowledge and eight years of experiences about Instructional Design, adult learning, and cutting-edge learning technologies. Please feel free to contact me if you have any questions about my portfolio.
